Get entity live data

get_entity_live_data.Rd

Get an entity's live data (wait times, availability, parade times, etc.) as well as for all child entities.

Usage

get_entity_live_data(entity_id, verbose = TRUE)

Arguments

entity_id

Character. Either the GUID or the slug string for a given entity.

verbose

Logical. Whether you would like messages to print in the console.

Value

A data frame with live data for the entity

Examples

## Live data for Walt Disney World
# \donttest{
get_entity_live_data("waltdisneyworldresort")
#> ℹ Pulling live data for Walt Disney World® Resort
